com.tomscz.afswinx.validation

Class AFBaseValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afswinx.validation.AFBaseValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AFValidations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainsValidator, MinAndMaxLenghtValidator, NumberValidator, RequiredValidator, RetypeValidator

    public abstract class AFBaseValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AFValidations
    This is base validator class. Use it to implements your own validation. Each validator in AFSwinx is child of this class.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)
